testcase.classname: Feature to test Amazon Search Functionality
testcase.name: Search for the products under Books category
testcase.system-out: Given I visit the website as Guest user.....................................passed When I select the books option from the dropdown............................passed And I click on Search Icon button...........................................passed Then I should see the Books page loaded.....................................passed And I should see Books at Amazon as heading.................................passed
